duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and lead the planning phase of SAP projects, including gathering requirements, setting timelines, allocating resources, and defining project scope.
Design, develop, and implement SAP modules to meet business requirements, adhering to coding standards and best practices. Identify opportunities to re-engineer/integrate existing processes.
Collaborate and work with the team of SAP ABAB/HANA/Fiori developers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business or related field
